Positions: Regional Market Research Manager

SKILLS AND EXPERIANCE REQUIREMENTS

must well write and read English, knowledge of local (native) language if different, (translating)
knowledge of local newspapers, magasines, TV broadcasting network and others mass media required.
must have an experience of usage various marketing and economical data sources.
Experience of Internet usage,
Understanding of marketing trends
must have internet and fax access
degree in marketing, statistics, social science is preferred
must be goal oriented, taking the initiative, communicable

RESPONSIBILITIES

Proxy representative in appointed territory.
Data collecting.
Negotiations with clients and business partners.
Part time work, combine jobs alowed.

Price-work payments plan
Time wage plan
plus Comissions up to 5000$
